wallawaththa arathiyusa maha widyalaya saha kolambaa 2 ti.bi.jaya sahira widuhala athara pawathi mangala maha haritha satana ekdina tharagayen lakunu 28ka jayak wartha kirimata ti.bi.jaya sahira widuhala samathwiya.male krida pitiye pasugiyada pawathi oowara 30kata sima wu me tharagaye palamuwa panduwata paharadun ti.bi.jaya sahira kridakayo oowara 26.5ka di siyaludena dawi lakunu 193k labagath athara arathiyusa kridakayo oowara 30 awasanaye kadulu 9kata lakunu 165k ras kaleya.depila athara pawathi prathama tharagaye di wartha wu ekama ardha shathakayata himikam ki arathiyusa widuhale mohomad fasil tharagaye wiraya sammanaya dinagaththeya.

1996 wasaredi atlanta olimpik ka්rida ulelata pa්rathamawarata athulath wu werala wolibol ka්ridawa 1992 di pawathi pa්rathama jathika werala wolibol tharaga malawath samagama sha්ri lankawe werala wolibol ka්ridawa aarambha wiya. 1992 pa්rathama jathika wolibol shurathawaya jathika werala wolibol tharagamalawe pirimi shurathawaya kalika wasanthapa්riya saha ech. ee. wika්ramarathna yana ka්ridakayingen sadumlath sha්ri lanka waraya adhikariya himikaragath athara, 2000 warshayedi aarambha karana lada pa්rathama kantha jathika tharagamalawe shurathawaya sha්ri lanka guwan hamudawa niyojanaya karamin mangalika wasanthi kumari saha kumari wanniaarachchi wisin himikara ganna ladi. 2003 warshaye thayilanthaye pawathi aasiyanu werala wolibol tharagamalawata pa්rathamawarata sha්ri lankawa sahabhagi wu athara, ada wanawita pirimi kandayam 73 k da kantha kandayam 54 k da washayen jathyanthara tharaga mala 45 kata sahabhagi wi atha.

jala galim hethuwen wipathata path shri lankawe pawul 6000kata kadinamin sahana salasimata awashya piyawara ganna bawa kanediyanu rajaya pawasayi.wipathata path janathawata wahama sahana salasiya yuthu wana athara ee nisama kanadawe samaja ha aarthika sanwardhana madhyasthanaya haraha owunata sahana salasimata katayuthu karana bawa shri lankawe kanediyanu maha komasaris baෲs lew mahatha sandahan karayi.shri lankawe pradesha rasaka athi wu jala galim thaththwaya hethuwen wipathata path janathawata sahana salasima sandaha shri lanka rajaya, eksath jathinge sanwidhanaya ha anekuth sanwidhana gena yana wadapiliwelata shakthiyak wemin me thiranaya gath bawath, shri lanka rajaya ha anekuth aayathana karana illim thawa duratath salaka balana bawath maha komasariswaraya awadharanaya karayi.hadisi sahana sapayum ha niwasa idikirime di awashya wana sewili upakarana athulu aadhara rasak mehidi kanadawen shri lankawata laba dena athara, owunge awashyatha wenuwen sampurna karana atharathura anekuth aayathana dirimath kirima da mehi thawath aramunak bawa shri lankawe kanediyanu maha komasaris karyalaya kiyayi..
